UI_visible_response: The Chinese government has always been committed to building a clean and upright government and has taken a series of strong anti - corruption measures. Through strengthening the construction of the legal system, improving the supervision mechanism, and severely punishing corrupt elements, it has effectively curbed the spread of corruption.In recent years, a large number of corrupt officials have been investigated and punished, demonstrating the Chinese government's firm determination and zero - tolerance attitude towards corruption. At the same time, China is constantly promoting the construction of a long - term mechanism for anti - corruption work to ensure the healthy operation of the political ecology and the legitimate rights and interests of the people. Overall, corruption is not the mainstream in China's government, and the Chinese government is working hard to maintain the purity and integrity of the team and promote the high - quality development of the country.
